GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves a specific review object relevant to inputted id

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: increments or decrements vote count on inputted review. Must be passed with an object in this format -- {inc_votes: 15} or {inc_votes: -15}

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: posts a comment by inputted review id. Must be passed with an object in this format -- {username: 'mallionaire', body: 'Ah what a wonderful game! So simple I could play it with both of my hands full, as they were all night, with wine.',}

comment.body: Ah what a wonderful game! So simple I could play it with both of my hands full, as they were all night, with wine.
comment.author: mallionaire

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: gives an array of all of the comments associated with inputted review id
